roleset.name: enhance appearance, enhancing appearance (of outdoor spaces, etc)

example.text: ... several major projects such as * landscaping Macau's Marintime Museum and setting up venues ...

example.name: Arg0, 1, ADJ
example.text: Discuss with Conrail - or Conrail's successor - the possibility of their landscaping the property along Girard Avenue in exchange for a pledge by the Zoo to maintain the landscaping in good order.
example.arg: in exchange for a pledge by the Zoo to maintain the landscaping in good order.

roleset.note: LANDSCAPE-V NOTES: Frameset created by Jena. (from landscape.01-v)
LANDSCAPING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, landscape.01. No VNcls. (from landscaping.01-n)
Watch out for instances that refer to the plants themselves, as these are not events. Arg3 of the verb frame omitted. (from landscaping.01-n)
